div.p: WE THANK EVERYBODY FOR MAKING THAT POSSIBLE.
AND FINALLY THE TIP OF THE DAY. WHENEVER FOLKS DIE SUDDENLY,
LIKE IN THE BOSTON ATTACK, MORTALITY COMES INTO PLAY.
MY FATHER DIED AT AGE 62 FROM MELANOMA AND ON HIS DEATHBED HE
TOLD ME HIS GREATEST REGRET WAS NOT LIVING UP TO HIS POTENTIAL.
I TOLD HIM THAT HE GAVE ME THE OPPORTUNITY TO REACH MY
POTENTIAL BECAUSE HE WORKED HARD AND LIVED A RESPONSIBLE LIFE.
AFTER HE PASSED, I BEGAN ASKING SENIOR CITIZENS ABOUT THEIR
THE POTENTIAL DEAL, NOT LIVING UP TO IT, AND FAILING TO HELP
PEOPLE. SOME SENIORS TOLD ME THEY DEEPLY
REGRET NOT HELPING PEOPLE WHEN THEY COULD HAVE.
SO THE TIP OF THE DAY IS THIS. RESPECT YOUR GOD GIVEN ACCOUNTS
AND GO DO GOOD THINGS WITH THEM AND HELP EVERYBODY YOU CAN.
AND HELP EVERYBODY YOU CAN. DO THAT AND YOU WILL HAVE NOREGRETS
>> WE WOULD LIKE YOU TO SPOUT OFF ABOUT THE FACTOR FROM
